amendment.description: Amendment encourages the National Weather Service and the Federal Aviation Administration to form a bi-agency working group to further assess the potential for National Weather Service operational use of FAA weather radar data.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to encourage the National Weather Service to form a bi-agency working group to further assess the potential for National Weather Service operational use of Federal Aviation Administration weather radar data, and to defined engineering considerations that would be involved in implementing a data sharing link between the FAA and the NWS.

action.text: Gekas amendment (A014) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the Gekas amendment (A014) as modified Agreed to without objection.
